stories.title: Bill Gates slams cryptos, NFTs as ‘100% based on greater fool theory’

stories.text:
https://tcpdumpcompiler.com/ebnf.html

I thought I was on to something here.

There have been times when I have needed to look for a needle (or needles) in a linux terminal haystack. Maybe you do not have confidence in your SIEM or have access to a PCAP, and all you can do is SSH into the box/router/etc. you are investigating. But maybe you need a highly tailored network filter to find what you are looking for.

Wouldn't it be nice if you could have a simple way to build up a complex and arcane BPF expression?

'Show HN:' indicated No.

What would turn this into something valuable?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do I make this project useful?
Replicas of Popular Webpages in Plain HTML/CSS
Carcinisation of mirrord (or: why we use Rust)
You can’t cash out: Bitcoin is not a Ponzi scheme It just works like one

stories.text:
In academia it is more common to give a year for every 7 worked, to take time off work to do something of your choosing that ultimately enhances your employer in some way. Say, writing a book.

If your employer offered you a sabbatical, what would you do with yourself?

I work in operations, I'd want something like 3 months to experiment with some ideas related to the software release cycle: version control, building, testing, releasing, and deploying a complex application (~50 packages, 20 clusters, 5 environments).
stories.title: Ask HN: What would you do if given a sabbatical?
